REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
Sub createRepord() GlobalScope.BasicLibraries.LoadLibrary("ALADIN") StatusBar(True) ToolBar(True) FormSizePrint()
if oDoc.isReadOnly then Dim oFrame as Object
SetDocUserProperty("oUserID_lokal", iUserID("PrintPreisliste")) SetDocUserProperty("oClientID", iClientIDOffset(iUserID_lokal) + 36) SetDocUserProperty("oEinstellungsID_lokal", iEinstellungsID(iUserID_lokal))
if iEinstellungsID_lokal=1 _ or InStr(fsTableList,";Leistungsgruppen_"& iEinstellungsID_lokal &";") = 0 _ or InStr(fsTableList,";Leistungsstamm_"& iEinstellungsID_lokal &";") = 0 _ then SetDocUserProperty("oLeistungsgruppen", "Leistungsgruppen") SetDocUserProperty("oLeistungsstamm", "Leistungsstamm") else SetDocUserProperty("oLeistungsgruppen", "Leistungsgruppen_"& iEinstellungsID_lokal) SetDocUserProperty("oLeistungsstamm", "Leistungsstamm_"& iEinstellungsID_lokal) end if if iEinstellungsID_lokal=1 _ or InStr(fsTableList,";Kunden_" & iEinstellungsID_lokal & ";") = 0 _ then SetDocUserProperty("oKunden", "Kunden") else SetDocUserProperty("oKunden", "Kunden_" & iEinstellungsID_lokal) end if
SetDocUserProperty("oTitle_lokal",sTitle(iUserID_lokal))
oFrame = StarDesktop.getCurrentFrame() oFrame.setTitle(sTitle_lokal &" - Druck Preisliste")
Kontaktdaten.KontaktDaten() End if End Sub
Sub Document_ruecksetzen() Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_1","Anschrift_Eigen_1") Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_2","Anschrift_Eigen_2") Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_3","Anschrift_Eigen_3") Feld_fuellen("Anschrift","Anschrift") Feld_fuellen("Document_Typ","Document_Typ") Feld_fuellen("Kontakt_Bez","Kontakt_Bez") Feld_fuellen("Kontakt","Kontakt") Feld_fuellen("Bankverbindung_Bez","Bankverbindung_Bez") Feld_fuellen("Bankverbindung","Bankverbindung") Feld_fuellen("Geschaeftsfuehrer_Bez","Geschaeftsfuehrer_Bez") Feld_fuellen("Firmendaten","Firmendaten") oDoc.getTextFields().refresh() End Sub
Function FieldContent(sField as string) as String Dim vField as Variant,vFieldMaster as Variant Dim sFieldName as String sFieldName = "com.sun.star.text.FieldMaster.User." + sField vFieldMaster = oDoc.getTextFieldMasters.getByName(sFieldName) FieldContent = vFieldMaster.Content End Function
Sub Feld_fuellen(sField as string,sInhalt as string ) Dim vField as Variant,vFieldMaster as Variant Dim sFieldName as String sFieldName = "com.sun.star.text.FieldMaster.User." + sField vFieldMaster = oDoc.getTextFieldMasters.getByName(sFieldName) vFieldMaster.Content = sInhalt End Sub
Sub Feld_loeschen(sField as string) Dim vField as Variant,vFieldMaster as Variant Dim sFieldName as String Dim bFound as boolean vField = oDoc.createInstance("com.sun.star.text.TextField.User") sFieldName = "com.sun.star.text.FieldMaster.User." + sField bFound = oDoc.getTextFieldMasters.hasbyname(sFieldName) if bFound Then vFieldMaster = oDoc.getTextFieldMasters.getByName(sFieldName) vFieldMaster.Content = "" vFieldMaster.dispose() End If End Sub
Function ifPageCount as Integer Dim oDocument As Object,oTextfield As Object,oCurElement As Object Dim iElementCount as integer oDocument = oDoc.CurrentController.Model oTextfield = oDocument.getTextfields.CreateEnumeration iElementCount=0 While oTextField.hasmoreElements oCurElement = oTextField.NextElement if oCurElement.SupportsService("com.sun.star.text.TextField.PageCount") and iElementCount=0 then ifPageCount=oCurElement.getPresentation(False) 'Print oCurElement.getPresentation(true), oCurElement.getAnchor.getString iElementCount=1 end if Wend End Function
Function flAnzahlLeistungen as long Dim sSQL1 as String Dim oRecord1 as Object sSQL1="select count(*)"&_ " from "& sLeistungsstamm &" as t1,"& sLeistungsgruppen &" as t2"&_ " where t1.Leistungsgruppe = t2.GruppenID and t2.PrintPreisliste = 1" oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() flAnzahlLeistungen=oRecord1.getString(1) Wend End Function
